meanings: Oh dear!, (Oh) Dear me!, Good gracious!, Crikey!

vlive.korean: 거 참, 참 참 그냥... Man, man! Just... 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : YUB Night🌙
아 거 참 돕고 삽시다! We need to help each other out! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나는 누구를 좋아하는 걸까 [연애미수] EP04
vlive.english: We need to help each other out!

vlive.korean: 거참 칭찬 알레르기 있는데. I am allergic to compliments. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 마음의 안정즈🤔🤔🤔
거참 말 섭섭하게 하네. You say things so disappointing... 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 바람피우고 잠수탄 전남친이 찾아왔다 [한입만] - EP.06
[거참 알만한 사람이 넘어갑시다] 그랬다고요 이렇게요. This is how I did it. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라 4화> 동시 생중계
vlive.english: This is how I did it.

examples.korean: So much for that idea! 발음듣기 그 아이디어란 거 참! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: So much for that idea! 발음

examples.korean: That’s funny—he was here a moment ago and now he’s gone. 발음듣기 거 참 괴상하군, 그가 좀 전에 여기 있었는데 지금 가 버리고 없다니. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That’s funny—he was here a moment ago and now he’s gone. 발음

examples.korean: ‘Failed again, I’m afraid.’ ‘Oh, hard luck.’ 발음듣기 “또 실패한 것 같애.” “거 참, 안됐군.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Failed again, I’m afraid.’ ‘Oh, hard luck.’ 발음

examples.korean: ‘I failed by one point.’ ‘That’s tough luck.’ 발음듣기 “난 1점 차로 떨어졌어.” “거 참 운도 없군.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I failed by one point.’ ‘That’s tough luck.’ 발음

examples.korean: ‘She doesn’t try hard enough.’ ‘That’s rich, coming from you.’ 발음듣기 “그녀는 충분히 열심히 노력을 안 해.” “거 참 재밌군. 너한테서 그런 말이 나오다니.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘She doesn’t try hard enough.’ ‘That’s rich, coming from you.’ 발음
